amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish procedures for the Bureau of Land Management to dispose of unwanted Federally controlled lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 106-612 to allow the BLM to auction public lands identified for disposal in their Land Management Plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibbons amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 250 (Roll no. 175).
